name: whisky bottle
description: An almost-empty bottle of something strong enough to melt paint.

name: case file
description: A battered manila folder. Inside: names, addresses, and one very dead end.

name: gold cufflink
description: A monogrammed cufflink with the initials 'L.C.' — still damp from the rain.

name: music box
description: A delicate silver box with a broken ballerina on top. When wound, it plays a familiar melody.

name: crowbar
description: Rusty, but solid. It might come in handy for forcing something open.

name: locker
description: A locked metal locker, paint flaking. There's a faint ticking from within.

name: ledger
description: A thick book filled with shipping dates, names, and numbers that don’t add up. Some pages are torn out.

name: boat manifest
description: A shipping log listing recent arrivals. One name has been hastily scratched out.

name: locker key
description: A small brass key engraved with a locker number. Feels warm, like it was just used.
